dmca.title: Thai Company Complains of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
TILLEKE & GIBBINS INTERNATIONAL, LTD.

							March 7,2003

TILLEKE & GAIRING BUILDING
[Private]
BANGKOK 10330
TAILAND	

By FACSIMILE [Private], Confirmation by Registered Mail

[Private] 
c/o Yahoo Inc. 
[Private]
Sunnyvale, CA 94089 
USA
[Private]

Re. NOTICE AND TAKEDOWN REQUEST against: 

1.	http://search.yahoo.com/bin/search?p=%22hot+body+jewelry%22

2.      http://search.yahoo.com/search?p=%22hot+body+jewelry%22
        &hq=site: 66.216.94. 162

3.	other pages on 66.216.94,162

Dear [private]:

We, Tilleke & Gibbins International Ltd., are privileged to represent FQV (Thailand) Co. Ltd. ("FQV") in connection with enforcement of its proprietary rights under Thai law.  We make the following statement in good faith and under penalty of perjury.

Our client is involved in a dispute with a former consultant(s) who has acted in violation of the Thai Copyright Act, Thai Trade Secrets Act and Thai Penal Code. In addition, our client is concerned that its consultant, and/or co-conspirators, has prejudiced its rights to certain of our client's intellectual property and/or other assets in breach of certain contractual obligations.

It has come to our attention that a Monster Commerce website (66.216.94.162)
